job_description:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com


Job Title: Front-End React Developer
 Location: Sunnyvale, CA
 
Role Overview
We are seeking a skilled Front-End React Developer to design, develop, and maintain high-quality web and mobile user interfaces. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in ReactJS and modern JavaScript frameworks, along with hands-on experience deploying applications in cloud and containerized environments.
 
 
Key Responsibilities
Front-End Development
Develop and maintain web and mobile applications using ReactJS, React Hooks, NextJS, JavaScript (ES6), and TypeScript.
Build reusable UI components and front-end modules with a focus on performance, scalability, and maintainability.
Apply strong understanding of React fundamentals, including:
Virtual DOM
Component lifecycle
State and props management
Utilize state management libraries such as Redux, Flux, or Flow.
Application Development & Performance
Create responsive, cross-browser compatible user interfaces using HTML and CSS.
Ensure high performance, accessibility, and code quality across applications.
Promote code reusability and efficiency through best practices and component-driven development.
Containerization & Cloud
Deploy and manage front-end applications using Docker and Kubernetes.
Work with cloud platforms such as Azure Cloud Stack, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), or equivalent cloud environments.
Collaborate with DevOps teams to support CI/CD pipelines and environment deployments.
Design & Documentation
Develop and maintain functional, technical, and UI design documentation.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers and backend teams to translate requirements into technical solutions.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
 
Required Skills & Qualifications
Strong hands-on experience with ReactJS, React Hooks, and NextJS.
Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
Experience building React-based web and mobile applications.
Knowledge of state management patterns and libraries (Redux, Flux, Flow).
Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience working in cloud environments such as Azure or GCP.
Strong understanding of front-end architecture, performance optimization, and responsive design.
Ability to create clear and concise technical and UI documentation.


  

 Jitendra Singh
 Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com
